亲身体验 Windows Copilot - Bing.com Web 包装器https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/hands-on-with-windows-copilot-a-bingcom-web-wrapper/ Mon, 10 Jul 2023 11:36:14 -0400玛雅克·帕尔玛MicrosoftSoftware https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/hands-on-with-windows-copilot-a-bingcom-web-wrapper/ The first preview of Windows Copilot falls short of expectations. Though it promises features like turning on simple settings like switching to dark mode, the 'AI integration' feels far from native. In fact, Copilot feels like a web wrapper, a pane running Bing.com within Microsoft Edge rather than a fully integrated part of Windows [...]
